text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "Signup source attribution is directly related to identifying the origin of users signing up, which facilitates event stitching (linking events or actions back to the user) and helps in assigning visitors to experiments for testing purposes. Some purposes on the list are more closely associated with this description than others. Specifically, event stitching and attributing signup sources tie into customer management disciplines and technical service provision. Assigning visitors to experiments links with purposes related to conducting research and customer relationship management.",
  "results": [
    36,
    61,
    78,
    95
  ],
  "unmatchedConcepts": [
    "Personalised advertising",
    "Payment management",
    "Legal compliance"
  ]
}
```
